title: Replace Lucide icons with image assets

requirements.text: Replace the current lucide-react icons with static image assets across the site, specifically: - In `frontend/src/App.tsx`, replace `Phone`, `Mail`, and `MapPin` icon components in the header/mobile header and Contact section with `` tags pointing to new files under `/assets/generated/`. - In `frontend/src/components/BookServiceDialog.tsx`, replace `Loader2` (submitting spinner) and `CheckCircle2` (success state) with `` tags pointing to new files under `/assets/generated/`. The new images must visually match the current icon sizes and alignment (including existing Tailwind sizing classes) and include appropriate `alt` text for accessibility.

quotes: I need to change Icons to Image's

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` no longer imports `Phone`, `Mail`, or `MapPin` from `lucide-react`, and the header/contact UI uses `` elements with `/assets/generated/...` sources instead.

`frontend/src/components/BookServiceDialog.tsx` no longer imports `Loader2` or `CheckCircle2` from `lucide-react`, and both the pending (Submitting...) and success states use `` elements with `/assets/generated/...` sources instead.

Icon images render at the same apparent sizes as before (e.g., ~14â€“16px in the header row icons and ~24px in the Contact section, and ~16px spinner + ~64px success icon in the dialog), without breaking layout.
All replacement images include non-empty, English `alt` text (e.g., "Phone", "Email", "Location", "Loading", "Success").

requirements.text: Add the required icon image files as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the exact filenames listed in `imageRequirements.required`, so the frontend can reference them via `/assets/generated/...`.

quotes: I need to change Icons to Image's

acceptanceCriteria: The app successfully loads these assets at runtime via `/assets/generated/<filename>` without backend changes.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Adding Google Search Console verification meta tags or changing SEO/sitemap behavior.
Publishing/deploying a specific draft version to production.
Replacing the existing service category image icons (AC/Washing Machine/Refrigerator/Electrical), which are already images.

required: Phone handset icon, solid/flat style, transparent background (phone-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Envelope/mail icon, solid/flat style, transparent background (email-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Map pin/location icon, solid/flat style, transparent background (location-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Circular loading spinner icon (separate frames not required), transparent background (loading-spinner.dim_64x64.png)
Checkmark in a circle icon, transparent background (success-check.dim_256x256.png)
